channel.title: Help connecting
channel.description:
Alright guys I just joined forums and heard about this applet you guys make, very impressive coding. Now I am having some trouble using the web client and connecting when i try to connect i get this error
[img]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/6381/errorwtfmateiwantmopartoy5.png[/img]
So i'm not exactly sure whats wrong, I've tried connecting to other peoples servers and still get same error
Also I'm on a computer in which .bat, .exe have been disabled if not installed on computer, now can anyone hook me up with a Java based client that runs on my computer ( I can run Java Applets ) and also something in which i don't need any .Bat's to open or anything, Thanks a bunch.
If someone can help I would probly honor there name daily =D

item.title: Help connecting
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy:

This is my site, you can run it directly without download or download it, this is in .jar. http://roflrofl.no-ip.info/Client/MoparScape.lnk

Read full topic

item.title: Help connecting
item.dc:creator: @Mopar Mopar@|@Help
item.description:
@Mopar wrote:

I feel your problem is that, you haven’t got moparscape client… OR… Your doing something wrong, like typing in wrong port, or IP… You HAVE to have them.

Read full topic
